languages.text: "Кибелла станет новым Висирем. В странствии ее к Неумирающему, в выборе, что совершила она, отразится новый узор Кровавой паутины. Я же отправлюсь к Нему, ибо долго ждал этого".
"Kibellah will be the new Vizsier. Her journey to the Undying One and the choice she made will be reflected in the Bloodspun Web's new pattern. As for me... I will go to Him, as I have long awaited."
languages.original_text: "Кибелла станет новым Висирем. В странствии ее к Неумирающему, в выборе, что совершила она, отразится новый узор Кровавой паутины. Я же отправлюсь к Нему, ибо долго ждал этого".

traits.locale_text: "Kibellah will be the new Vizsier. Her journey to the Undying One and the choice she made will be reflected in the Bloodspun Web's new pattern. As for me, I will go to Him, since I have awaited that for a long time."

"Kibellah will be the new Vizsier. Her journey to the Undying One and the choice she made will be reflected in the Bloodspun Web's new pattern. As for me, I will go to Him, since I have awaited that for a long time."

"Kibellah will be the new Vizsier. Her journey to the Undying One and the choice she made will be reflected in the Bloodspun Web's new pattern. As for me... I will go to Him, as I have long awaited."

languages.text: « Kibellah va me succéder à la tête du culte. Son cheminement jusqu'à l'Immortel et le choix qu'elle a fait se reflétera dans la nouvelle trame de la Toile de Sang. Quant à moi... Depuis le temps que j'attends ce moment, je vais enfin pouvoir Le rejoindre. »
languages.original_text: "Kibellah will be the new Vizsier. Her journey to the Undying One and the choice she made will be reflected in the Bloodspun Web's new pattern. As for me... I will go to Him, as I have long awaited."

traits.locale_text: « Kibellah va me succéder à la tête du culte. Son cheminement jusqu'à l'Immortel et le choix qu'elle a fait se reflétera dans la nouvelle trame de la Toile de Sang. Quant à moi... Depuis le temps que j'attends ce moment, je vais enfin pouvoir Le rejoindre. »

languages.text: «Kibellah será la nueva Visir. Su travesía hasta el Inmortal y la elección que tomó se verá reflejada en el nuevo patrón de la Red Sanguinolenta. En cuanto a mí... Me iré con Él, llevo mucho tiempo esperando este momento».
languages.original_text: "Kibellah will be the new Vizsier. Her journey to the Undying One and the choice she made will be reflected in the Bloodspun Web's new pattern. As for me... I will go to Him, as I have long awaited."

traits.locale_text: «Kibellah será la nueva Visir. Su travesía hasta el Inmortal y la elección que tomó se verá reflejada en el nuevo patrón de la Red Sanguinolenta. En cuanto a mí... Me iré con Él, llevo mucho tiempo esperando este momento».

languages.text: 「キベラは新しいヴィジールになるのです。彼女の不死の者へと至る旅路と選択は、ブラッドスパン・ウェブの新しい形に映し出されるでしょう。私自身は…あの方の元へ行きます。長らく待ち望んでいた通り」
languages.original_text: "Kibellah will be the new Vizsier. Her journey to the Undying One and the choice she made will be reflected in the Bloodspun Web's new pattern. As for me... I will go to Him, as I have long awaited."

traits.locale_text: 「キベラは新しいヴィジールになるのです。彼女の不死の者へと至る旅路と選択は、ブラッドスパン・ウェブの新しい形に映し出されるでしょう。私自身は…あの方の元へ行きます。長らく待ち望んでいた通り」

languages.text: “绮贝菈将会成为新任宿老。她追随不死之神的旅途本身，以及她在旅途中做出的所有选择，都会反映在织血罗网新的图案上。至于我……我要回到祂身边了，我已经等得太久了。”
languages.original_text: "Kibellah will be the new Vizsier. Her journey to the Undying One and the choice she made will be reflected in the Bloodspun Web's new pattern. As for me... I will go to Him, as I have long awaited."

traits.locale_text: “绮贝菈将会成为新任宿老。她追随不死之神的旅途本身，以及她在旅途中做出的所有选择，都会反映在织血罗网新的图案上。至于我……我要回到祂身边了，我已经等得太久了。”

languages.text: "Kibellah wird der neue Wesir sein. Ihre Reise zum Todlosen und ihre Wahl werden im neuen Muster des Blutgesponnenen Netzes reflektiert werden. Was mich angeht ... Ich werde zu ihm gehen. Lange habe ich darauf gewartet."
languages.original_text: "Kibellah will be the new Vizsier. Her journey to the Undying One and the choice she made will be reflected in the Bloodspun Web's new pattern. As for me... I will go to Him, as I have long awaited."

traits.locale_text: "Kibellah wird der neue Wesir sein. Ihre Reise zum Todlosen und ihre Wahl werden im neuen Muster des Blutgesponnenen Netzes reflektiert werden. Was mich angeht ... Ich werde zu ihm gehen. Lange habe ich darauf gewartet."

languages.text: "Kibellah, yeni Vezir olacak. Ölmeyen'e yolculuğu ve verdiği karar, Kanipi Ağı'nın yeni motifinde kendini gösterecek. Bana gelirsek... Ben, nicedir beklediğim üzere O'na gideceğim."
languages.original_text: "Kibellah will be the new Vizsier. Her journey to the Undying One and the choice she made will be reflected in the Bloodspun Web's new pattern. As for me... I will go to Him, as I have long awaited."
